title: Race condition in restarting folder

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:

Theoretically there should be a file set but apparently it's nil (deleted). There's no locking to prevent this as we release the lock in RestartFolder between creating the set and calling startFolderLocked.
